item.title: Good Cross-functional Team/Bad Cross-functional Team
item.description: News at Reco! Soon - exactly 1 next month from when I’m writing this blog post - I’m going to take ownership of all delivery in the company. This includes changing my title to VP R&D (from VP of Engineering), building a structure of 4 cross-functional teams, and growing the group members a lot faster. This is a big move for me, and I want it to succeed. I wrote this document to help me (and my teams) visualize how will good teams look.
